Name: Solar System
About the game: Rediscover the solar system! Solar System is a relaxing game, which will allow you to deepen your knowledge of the Solar System by interacting with the planets! Features: ■ The Sun with 9 Planets and 5 Satellites in 4K! ■ Information about each planet! ■ Interaction with the planets! ■ Relaxing space music!
